reviews.text: This school has provided us with many activities and opportunities like the Overseas Exchange Programmes, Esplanade Trips to watch plays and Science related Programmes that not only helped me to grow and develop within the school environment, but they’ve also had significant impact outside school. They’ve taught me valuable skills, built my confidence and shaped how I approach real world challenges. These opportunities have definitely left a huge impact on me whether it is learning new skills I could apply for the future I can uphold or the bond I make with friends and I will forever remember them.

Thanks to the school I was able to experience many engaging activities that helped me gain useful skills that are and will be useful such as leadership training, Overseas Exchange Program, school based learning journeys and also bio olympiads. This helped me gain resilience and helped me grow to be more willing and enthusiastic to learn and understand. This would have not been possible without the support of the school and teachers and all the memories and learnings with my friends will not be forgotten and will help me to strive in the future.

I enjoy the many activities that the school plans for us in times of celebration such as youth day. The school hosts many opportunities for us to engage and work towards our future in my future tertiary education

I miss the days of my old school and all the wonderful memories we made together. It brings me back whenever we all have a ton of fun and we had cherished moments. Looking back now i feel everyone has their own story.

Going to miss them #Extraordinary 4T2
this school really gave me lots of opportunities to bond with my peers although I do hate some of them and I do not regret coming to this school!
